comment: The CIA PROGRAM was "LIFELONG". They shut it down when they learned of Facebook, which stole technology from another company in Ohio, which is where Zucktard was from. Sheryl Sandberg is a member of the Senior Exec Service and has been a CIA tool at times. I think she runs the show, not Zucktard.
